verses.roman:
aśru-kampa-pulaka-preme śarīra asthire
'kṛṣṇa' bala, 'kṛṣṇa' bala--bale uccaiḥsvare

synonyms: aśru—tears; kampa—trembling; pulaka—jubilation; preme—in ecstatic love; śarīra—the whole body; asthire—restless; kṛṣṇa bala—say Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa bala—say Kṛṣṇa; bale—the Lord says; uccaiḥ-svare—very loudly.
translation: The Lord's body was restless, and tears, trembling and jubilation were manifest. He said very loudly, "Chant Kṛṣṇa! Chant Kṛṣṇa!"
